title: F*cking Doge so Nasus
body: Okay Riot. I think its time so realise that nasus{{champion:75}}  is TO op. First a tank with life steal is TO much. Second a Q that one shot while being a tank is TO much. Third a 99% slow is TO much. Fourth a I aoe that have a magic domage burst while being AD so TO much because you don't even know what to buy versus a nasus{{champion:75}}  and finally an ult that make him almost invinsible is TO much because you cant kill him and he one shot all team. SO riot how can we win versus a Nasus{{champion:75}}?

replies.body: I feel like this is a post that was from season 3 or 4 and somehow got stuck in the system for a very long time.
too* too* too* too* too* too*
Would've ignored it if he didn't capitalize it. 6 times.
Nasus is actually quite weak and very underplayed.
If you think Nasus is so OP, then you play him.
Play Nasus, then get back to us.

"99% slow is TOO much"
yet nobody bats an eye to the guy who can get UNLIMITED INFINITE DURATION 99% slows and a revive every 33 seconds {{champion:26}} I would say "just prevent him from CSing" but he will prolly get armor/MR and ignore you for the rest of laning,then chunk you if you try to go in
Freeze lane, qss, grievous wounds, tag team him, focus him early and hide in a bush to halt minion aggro, forcing him away from minions while you also only last hit, which freezes the wave.
4 hours ago I played as Nasus and wrecked my laner, any chance that was you?
You got a down vote the second you called Nasus a Tank. Learn the game and quit bitching. SMH... Kids these days...
the slow is op, expecially nasus with triforce and stormragers. they should lower it imo
